full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** MA021-230160 Bridge Navigation Equipment Repair and Maintenance

**Reference Number:** WS4137531735-Doc4606257240
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Publication Date:** 2024-05-28

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-12T14:00:00

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking offers from contractors to provide experienced marine electronic technicians, parts, and equipment necessary to carry out inspections, continuous preventative maintenance, servicing, and repairs to navigation and bridge equipment and associated systems onboard Marine Atlantic vessels.

## Tender Details

- **Services Required:** Marine navigational or communication services
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- **Region of Delivery:** Nova Scotia
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End-User Entity:** Marine Atlantic Inc.

## Offer Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

- Offers must meet the requirements outlined in the tender document
- The evaluation team will assess offers based on the lowest price
- Offers must be submitted electronically through the designated portal

** Important Notice: **

- Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation
- Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful

## Contact Information

- Contact Name: Gillis2, Melanie
- Contact Email: melanie.gillis2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19844586?extsite=MTk4NDQ1ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
